name: Wireless Scoring
description: Scoring template for Wireless super-sector patents. Includes spectrum efficiency and wireless standard alignment metrics.

questions.question: How efficiently does this technology use wireless spectrum? Consider modulation schemes, channel utilization, interference management, and bandwidth optimization.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe spectrum efficiency improvements and techniques used.

questions.question: Rate alignment with wireless standards (WiFi 6/7, 5G/6G, Bluetooth 5.x, LoRa, Zigbee, etc.). Consider standard essentiality potential.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify relevant wireless standards and degree of alignment.

questions.question: How does this patent improve wireless range, coverage, or connection reliability?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe improvements to coverage, range, or reliability.
